title: Disclaimer
subtitle: Disclaimer
content:
The content on any website Uranium Technologies creates is either public data with citations or displayed with the permission of the data's creators. If there is any content on the website that violates terms & conditions, please inform the admin at Bryan [at] uraniumtechnologies [dot] com.


Data on the website is generated through automated data pipelines and is not verified or filtered beyond what is in the data mining scripts. Users agree to use the website 'as is' with no claims of liability against the site owner for any loss or damages caused by the website.
